response.overview: Dr. Xiao Zhou was unable to complete his studies and could not marry his girlfriend, leaving him helpless. Meanwhile, Lin Feng's company was on the brink of bankruptcy, and his wife was trying to divorce him. Dr. Xiao Zhou and Lin Feng were strangers, but they unexpectedly met in the Civil Affairs Bureau's divorce mediation room. They helped each other out of their respective life predicaments.Translated into English: Dr. Xiao Zhou was unable to finish his studies, preventing him from marrying his girlfriend and leaving him at a loss. At the same time, Lin Feng's business was on the brink of bankruptcy and his wife was threatening to divorce him. Though the two men had never met before, they coincidentally encountered each other in the Civil Affairs Bureau's divorce mediation room, where they helped each other get out of their difficult situations.
response.title: A Couple One World
